name: Elma WATSON, Administratrix of the Estate of Willie Watson, Deceased and Elma Watson in her Own Right, Respondents, v. TEMPLE UNIVERSITY, A Pennsylvania Non-Profit Corporation, Which is a Commonwealth University, Temple University Police Department and Temple University Parking Services, Petitioners

parties: Elma WATSON, Administratrix of the Estate of Willie Watson, Deceased and Elma Watson in her Own Right, Respondents, v. TEMPLE UNIVERSITY, A Pennsylvania Non-Profit Corporation, Which is a Commonwealth University, Temple University Police Department and Temple University Parking Services, Petitioners.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of March, 2001, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted on the following issue:
Whether the trial court order granting Respondent’s Motion to Compel discovery was appealable as of right pursuant to Pa.RAP.313. '
Respondent’s Motion for Expedited Consideration is denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
798 A.2d 1273
Elma WATSON, Administratrix of the Estate of Willie Watson, Deceased and Elma Watson in her Own Right, Respondents, v. TEMPLE UNIVERSITY, A Pennsylvania Non-Profit Corporation, Which is a Commonwealth University, Temple University Police Department and Temple University Parking Services, Petitioners.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 21, 2001.
